import React from 'react' import { prodapi } from '../services/API' import './../styling/smilar.scss' export const Similar = () => { return (

Similar Products

You May Like These Products Also

{ prodapi.map(ps=>{return(

{ps.title}

{ps.price} LE

{ps.where}

)}) }
) }
